statements: UPDATE user_activity_log SET activity_type = 'Login', timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00', transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_activity_log SET transaction_type = 'Withdrawal', timestamp = '2022-02-16 15:45:00', transaction_amount = 75.00 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity_log SET transaction_amount = 100.50, activity_type = 'purchase' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE user_activity_log SET activity_type = 'withdrawal', timestamp = '2022-02-15 12:30:00', transaction_type = 'bank transfer' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity_log SET action='login', timestamp='2022-01-01 10:00:00', transaction_id=1 WHERE user_id=100
UPDATE transaction_data SET amount=500.00, status='completed' WHERE transaction_id=10
UPDATE user_activity_log SET action='login', timestamp='2022-01-01 08:00:00', transaction_id=123 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE transaction_data SET status='approved', currency_type='USD', amount=1000.50 WHERE transaction_id=123;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 500.00, currency = 'Bitcoin' WHERE transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='Login' WHERE user_id=123 AND timestamp>'2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount=amount+100.50 WHERE currency='Bitcoin' AND user_id=456;
UPDATE user_activity_logs SET activity_description = 'Logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 1500.00, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity_logs SET activity_description = 'User updated profile photo' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = amount + 500.50 WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE user SET username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE transaction SET amount=1000.50 WHERE transaction_id=123;
UPDATE user_activity SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, activity_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'PURCHASE';
UPDATE transaction SET amount = 7500.25, transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-20 15:45:00' WHERE transaction_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
